content.p: Assistant Professor, Faculty of Social Sciences Siew Yee is an Assistant Professor at the University of Nottingham Malaysia (UNM). She received her Ph.D. in Business and Management from the University of Nottingham Malaysia in 2019. Prior to joining UNM, she has taught at several private universities in Malaysia. Siew Yee teaches Development Economics, Economic Integration II, Introduction to Microeconomics and Quantitative Economics II at UNM. Siew Yee's research focuses on how government policies and social programmes affect micro- and small firms, farmers, and poor households in developing countries.
